mainBoard.name: Nightmare
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

rulings.text: If you control 0 swamps, then the Nightmare has 0 toughness and will be put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action right before the next player gains priority.
Nightmare’s power and toughness changes as the number of Swamps you control changes.
Nightmare’s ability counts all lands you control with the subtype Swamp, not just ones named Swamp.
The ability that defines Nightmare’s power and toughness works everywhere, not just on the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Sengir Vampire
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

rulings.text: If Sengir Vampire deals nonlethal damage to a creature and then a different effect or damage source causes that creature to be put into a graveyard later in the turn, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger and it will get a +1/+1 counter.

Each time a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, check whether Sengir Vampire had dealt any damage to it at any time during that turn. If so, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger. It doesn't matter who controlled the creature or whose graveyard it was put into.
If Sengir Vampire and a creature it dealt damage to are both put into a graveyard at the same time, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger, but it will do nothing when it resolves.

mainBoard.text:

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich war nicht überzeugt davon, dass du eine Seele hast, bis ich sie mit eigenen Augen sah."—Liliana Vess

mainBoard.flavorText: Proud Alkmenos, who would not bow to Erebos in death, is now bowed by his own hubris for all eternity.

foreignData.flavorText: Alkmenos war zu stolz, sich im Tod vor Erebos zu verbeugen. Jetzt zwingt ihn seine Überheblichkeit auf ewig in die Knie.
foreignData.name: Last der Unterwelt
foreignData.text: Verzaubert eine KreaturDie verzauberte Kreatur erhält -3/-2.

foreignData.flavorText: El orgulloso Alkmenos, que rehusó inclinarse ante Erebos después de muerto, se inclina ahora bajo el peso de su propia arrogancia por toda la eternidad.
foreignData.name: El peso del Inframundo
foreignData.text: Encantar criatura.La criatura encantada obtiene -3/-2.

foreignData.flavorText: Le fier Alkménos qui refusa de s'incliner devant Érébos dans la mort, doit désormais fléchir pour l'éternité sous le poids de son orgueil démesuré.
foreignData.name: Fardeau du Monde souterrain
foreignData.text: Enchanter : créatureLa créature enchantée gagne -3/-2.

foreignData.flavorText: L'orgoglioso Alcmeno, che non volle piegarsi a Erebos nella morte, è ora piegato per l'eternità dalla sua stessa arroganza.
foreignData.name: Peso dell'Ade
foreignData.text: Incanta creaturaLa creatura incantata prende -3/-2.

foreignData.flavorText: 死してもなお、エレボスの前で膝をつくことを拒否した誇り高きアルクメノスは、自らの傲慢を背負い、永遠にその身を屈めることとなった。

foreignData.flavorText: Гордый Алкмен, не склонившийся после смерти перед Эребом, теперь навечно согнут бременем своего высокомерия.
